about_the_game:
Dive into the depths of madness in Lucy Grace, a chilling psychological horror adventure where you immerse yourself in the eerie atmosphere of an asylum known as H.E.L.L, where the shadows whisper secrets and nightmares come to life. As Lucy, a troubled amnesiac seeking answers to her fractured past, you must navigate the twisted corridors and solve cryptic puzzles to uncover the truth hidden within her past.

Explore the asylum's hauntingly detailed environments, each more sinister than the last, as you unravel the dark history of the institution and confront the demons lurking within your own mind. But beware – you are not alone. Encounter other lost souls trapped within the asylum's depths, each with their own secrets to share and their own motives to hide.

With its immersive storytelling, mind-bending puzzles, and spine-tingling atmosphere, Lucy Grce will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Will you survive the horrors that await or succumb to your past?
